name: Rip Tide Racer
description:
You'll need lightning fast reflexes to flip over those ramps and ride those waves. Are you sure you're quick enough? Because it'll take all you've got to hit each checkpoint and cross that finish line in RIP TIDE RACER!

HOW TO PLAY

Perform backflips off each wave and ramp to charge up your boost. Cross each checkpoint to gain more time and make it to the finish line as fast as you can! 

P.S...There are rumors that a secret lies to the left of the starting position...but how to get there...?

GAME CONTROLS

Accelerate: RIGHT ARROW

Back Flip: LEFT ARROW

Restart Level: R

Back to Level Select: L

CREDITS

This game is a collaboration between Pandamander and Coopal00ps, made in 31 days for our game-a-month challenge. Follow us here on itch, and on Twitter and Instagram for more games every month!

Amazing music from the awesome Tim Beek

Incredible 8-bit sound FX from shiru8bit

And thank YOU - THE PLAYER!

NOTE FOR MAC USERS !

If you try to open the game and it says it "can't be opened", try this: Unzip the downloaded file, then right click > Open instead of left clicking to open. This will give a new option to open the game
